channel.title: Help adding HP to torva and adding models to UltimateX client
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537306.0.html
^^ is the link to the UltimateX client/source...
Basically i want to do several things:
1) Add hp to torva/pernix/virtus 2) Add recolored Santas (ik recolors suck... but santa is an exception. 3) I want to add the chaotic weapons/shield... No clue how to add models to this client
And please take note that it may seem obvious to you when you explain it... however when others read it... it may not be that easy to understand. To the point- Dumb it down for me ;)
Please and thanks. P.S. please dont spam with junk :S
